T06D4080:162b-1: kalya na kanto n'a ma pra ka ra na /
T06D4080:162b-3: dge ba'i sdong po zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa /
T06D4080:162b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T06D4080:162b-5: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
T06D4080:162b-6: sdug bsngal dang bde ba dang /
T06D4080:162b-9: de dag gi rgyu rnams rtogs par byas la /
T06D4080:162b-10: de nas dor ba dang blang bar bya ba yang dag par rig par bya'o //
T06D4080:162b-11: de la ngan 'gro ni dmyal ba dang yi dags dang /
T06D4080:162b-13: sdug bsngal ni yid du mi 'ong ba nyams su myong ba'o //
T06D4080:162b-14: thob par byed pa'i rgyu ni chos ma yin pa ste /
T06D4080:162b-16: ma byin par len pa dang /
T06D4080:162b-17: 'dod pas log par g-yem par spyod pa dang /
T06D4080:162b-29: mu stegs pa rnams la mchod cing gus pas phyag byed pa dang /
T06D4080:162b-30: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems med pa ste /
T06D4080:162b-31: nyes par spyod pa bcu drug po de rnams kyang
T06D4080:162b-32: rang gis yi dam du bcas te byed pa dang
T06D4080:162b-33: / yi dam du bcas pa med par res 'ga' byed pa dang /
T06D4080:162b-35: gzhan byed pa la rjes su yi rang ba'i dbye
T06D4080:162b-36: bas re re la yang rnam pa bzhi bzhir dbye
T06D4080:162b-37: ba ste / chos ma yin pa'o //
T06D4080:162b-38: de rnams kyang dus yun rung po dag nyid yin
T06D4080:162b-39: pa'i phyir byang chub kyi bar du spang bar bya'o
T06D4080:162b-40: // gzhan rnams kyang spong du gzhug par bya'o //
T06D4080:162b-41: bde 'gro ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi 'gro ba rnams so //
T06D4080:162b-42: bde ba ni yid du 'ong ba nyams su myong ba'o //
T06D4080:162b-43: de thob par byed pa'i rgyu ni dge ba'i chos te /
T06D4080:162b-44: srog gcod pa spong ba dang /
T06D4080:162b-45: ma byin par len pa spong ba dang /
T06D4080:162b-46: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spyod pa spong ba dang /
T06D4080:162b-47: brdzun du smra ba spong ba dang /
T06D4080:162b-48: dbyen byed pa spong ba dang /
T06D4080:163a-1: rtsub po las log pa dang /
T06D4080:163a-5: log par lta ba spong ba dang /
T06D4080:163a-6: myos par 'gyur ba 'thung ba spong ba dang /
T06D4080:163a-7: log pas 'tsho ba spong ba dang /
T06D4080:163a-8: rnam par 'tshe ba spong ba dang /
T06D4080:163a-10: mu stegs pa rnams la gus par mchod pa dang phyag byed pa spong ba dang /
T06D4080:163a-11: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems med pa spangs te /
T06D4080:163a-12: nyes par spyod pa bcu drug las ldog pa'o //
T06D4080:163a-13: de rnams kyang yi dam du blangs pa dang /
T06D4080:163a-16: gzhan byed pa la rjes su yi rang ba de
T06D4080:163a-17: re re yang bzhi bzhir phye ba ni phyin ci
T06D4080:163a-19: de yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen mchog nyid de yin
T06D4080:163a-20: pas na nam byang chub kyi bar du dang du
T06D4080:163a-21: blang bar bya'o // gzhan rnams kyang de la gzhug par bya'o //
T06D4080:163a-22: de bzhin du gzhan gyi srog bsrung ba dang /
T06D4080:163a-23: rang gi srog kyang ster ba dang /
T06D4080:163a-24: gzhan gyi rdzas srung ba dang /
T06D4080:163a-26: gzhan gyi bud med srung ba dang /
T06D4080:163a-27: rang gi bud med kyang ster ba'o //
T06D4080:163a-28: bden pa'i tshig smra ba dang /
T06D4080:163a-29: gzhan bsrung ba'i tshig smra ba dang /
T06D4080:163a-30: snyan pa'i tshig smra ba dang /
T06D4080:163a-31: sdig pa med pa'i tshig dang /
T06D4080:163a-32: sems can thams cad la phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu ster bar 'dod pa dang /
T06D4080:163a-35: brdeg pa la sogs pa mi 'dod pa thams cad
T06D4080:163a-36: las sems can thams cad yongs su sgrol bar 'dod
T06D4080:163a-37: pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las
T06D4080:163a-38: de'i 'bras bu dag yod par yang dag par yid
T06D4080:163a-39: pa dang / ches pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bdud rtsi 'thung ba dang /
T06D4080:163a-40: 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa dang /
T06D4080:163a-41: sems can rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
T06D4080:163a-42: ji ltar nus pa bzhin du rab tu ster ba dang /
T06D4080:163a-43: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun las ston pa
T06D4080:163a-44: gzhan med par gus pas yang skyabs su 'gro ba
T06D4080:163a-45: sngon du song bas gus pas mchod cing phyag 'tshal
T06D4080:163a-46: ba la dngos po thams cad bdag nyid kyis rab
T06D4080:163a-48: sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba can gyi byams pa dang /
T06D4080:163a-49: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'o //
T06D4080:163b-0: @163b de rnams kyang yi dam du blangs pa dang /
T06D4080:163b-3: gzhan dag byed pa la rjes su yi rang ba ste /
T06D4080:163b-4: re re la yang rnam pa bzhi bzhir so sor dbye ba ni 'jug par bya ba'i chos so //
T06D4080:163b-5: de yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen te mchog nyid yin
T06D4080:163b-6: pa'i phyir nam byang chub ma thob kyi bar du
T06D4080:163b-8: gzhan rnams kyang de la gzhug par bya'o //
T06D4080:163b-9: 'khor ba'i phung po ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yin te /
T06D4080:163b-10: sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya'o //
T06D4080:163b-11: de thob par byed pa'i rgyu ni phung po rnams la rtag pa dang /
T06D4080:163b-14: bdag gi ba nges par sngon du song ba can gyi 'dod chags dang /
T06D4080:163b-22: lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /
T06D4080:163b-23: tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ste /
T06D4080:163b-26: mi dge ba la sogs pa'i las rnams ni kun 'byung ste /
T06D4080:163b-28: kun 'byung ni 'khor bar 'gro ba ris drug tu
T06D4080:163b-29: nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i phung po skye ba
T06D4080:163b-31: bye brag tu smra ba'i lta ba la gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa rnam pa gnyis te /
T06D4080:163b-32: lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
T06D4080:163b-33: lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T06D4080:163b-34: de la gang zag yod par smra ba ni yongs
T06D4080:163b-35: su dag pa'i phung po khyad par du 'phags pa
T06D4080:163b-36: tsam yod cing / las dang nyon mongs pa dang
T06D4080:163b-37: skye ba rnams zad pa ni phung po'i lhag ma
T06D4080:163b-38: dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T06D4080:163b-39: yongs su dag pa'i phung po yang zad nas gang
T06D4080:163b-40: zag tsam du gnas pa ni phung po lhag ma
T06D4080:163b-41: med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T06D4080:163b-42: gang zag med par smra ba ni yongs su dag
T06D4080:163b-43: pa'i phung po tsam gyi bdag nyid kyi 'phags pa
T06D4080:163b-44: las dang nyon mongs pa dang skye ba zad pa
T06D4080:163b-45: ni lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das
T06D4080:163b-46: pa'o // mar me zad pa bzhin yongs su dag
T06D4080:163b-47: pa'i phung po zad pa ni lhag ma med pa'i
T06D4080:163b-49: thar pa dang 'gog pa'i bden pa'o //
T06D4080:163b-50: 'gog pa ni mngon du bya ba'o //
T06D4080:164a-1: thob par byed pa'i rgyu ni yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /
T06D4080:164a-3: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /
T06D4080:164a-5: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /
T06D4080:164a-6: yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /
T06D4080:164a-7: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T06D4080:164a-8: tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi
T06D4080:164a-9: bdag nyid kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad de
T06D4080:164a-11: lam ni bsgom par bya ba'o //
T06D4080:164a-12: theg pa chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T06D4080:164a-13: phyin pa'i tshul la gnas pa ni sna tshogs gnyis
T06D4080:164a-14: su med pa'i ye shes gsal ba'i rang bzhin chos
T06D4080:164a-15: dang sprul pa'i sku gnyis kyi rten du gyur pa
T06D4080:164a-16: dang / mtshan dang dpe byad 'bar ba'i dpal 'byor
T06D4080:164a-17: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bdag nyid sna tshogs pa'i
T06D4080:164a-18: sprul pas ji srid nam 'khor ba ma stongs kyi
T06D4080:164a-19: bar du 'gro ba'i don du byed pa dang ldan
T06D4080:164a-20: dang / pa ste / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T06D4080:164a-21: sangs rgyas rnams bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs
T06D4080:164a-22: dang / pa ste / pa dang / las dang skye ba rnams zad pa ni thar pa dang /
T06D4080:164a-24: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
T06D4080:164a-26: 'gog pa ni mngon du bya ba'o //
T06D4080:164a-27: de thob par byed pa'i rgyu ni 'gro ba mtha'
T06D4080:164a-28: dag sdug bsngal rnam pa gsum gyi me rab tu
T06D4080:164a-34: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T06D4080:164a-35: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T06D4080:164a-36: zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /
T06D4080:164a-39: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gsum mo //
T06D4080:164a-40: dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang /
T06D4080:164a-42: sems can gyi don byed pa'i tshul khrims te /
T06D4080:164a-43: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsum mo //
T06D4080:164a-44: sdug bsngal la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang
T06D4080:164a-45: gzhan gyi gnod pa dang du len pa'i bzod pa
T06D4080:164a-46: dang chos nyid zab mo la mi skrag pa'i bzod
T06D4080:164a-47: pa ste / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gsum mo //
T06D4080:164a-48: dge ba'i las rnams la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
T06D4080:164a-50: brtsams pa mthar phyin pa'i brtson 'grus te /
T06D4080:164a-51: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa gsum mo //
T06D4080:164b-0: rang gi @164b skyon sel bar byed pa'i bsam gtan dang /
T06D4080:164b-1: rdzu 'phrul thob par byed pa'i bsam gtan dang /
T06D4080:164b-2: mthong ba'i cho la bde bar gnas par byed pa'i bsam gtan te /
T06D4080:164b-3: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsum mo //
T06D4080:164b-4: thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang /
T06D4080:164b-5: bsams pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang /
T06D4080:164b-6: bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab ste /
T06D4080:164b-7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa gsum mo //
T06D4080:164b-8: sems can thams cad kyi skyon thams cad sel bar byed pa'i thabs dang /
T06D4080:164b-9: sems can thams cad kyi yon tan thams cad thob par byed pa'i thabs dang /
T06D4080:164b-10: bde bar myur du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par byed pa'i thabs te /
T06D4080:164b-11: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsum mo //
T06D4080:164b-12: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i smon lam dang /
T06D4080:164b-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i smon lam dang /
T06D4080:164b-14: sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa'i smon lam ste /
T06D4080:164b-15: smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa gsum mo //
T06D4080:164b-16: las thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i stobs dang /
T06D4080:164b-17: nyon mongs pa 'joms par byed pa'i stobs dang /
T06D4080:164b-18: bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba la sogs pa rab tu 'joms par byed pa'i stobs te /
T06D4080:164b-19: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa gsum mo //
T06D4080:164b-20: rnam par rtog pa sel bar byed pa'i ye shes dang /
T06D4080:164b-21: rtog pa dang mi rtog pa mnyam du pa nyid du byed pa'i ye shes dang /
T06D4080:164b-22: sems can gyi don thams cad rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes te /
T06D4080:164b-23: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa gsum mo //
T06D4080:164b-24: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mtha' dag bsdus
T06D4080:164b-25: pa'i rang bzhin ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i
T06D4080:164b-27: lam gyi bden pa'i lam ni pha rol tu phyin
T06D4080:164b-28: pa'i theg pa'i tshul gyis dngos su kun du spyad
T06D4080:164b-29: par bya'o // gsang sngags kyi theg pa la gnas
T06D4080:164b-30: pa ni sna tshogs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
T06D4080:164b-31: shin tu gsal ba'i rang bzhin bde ba chen po
T06D4080:164b-32: par bya'o // dang / chos dang ngo bo nyid
T06D4080:164b-33: kyi sku bzhi mnyam par brten pa dpal gsang ba
T06D4080:164b-34: 'dus pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i
T06D4080:164b-35: rang bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad kyis 'bar ba'i dpal
T06D4080:164b-36: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bdag nyid ji srid du
T06D4080:164b-37: rab tu phye ba'i sprul pas ji srid du nam
T06D4080:165a-1: ma stongs kyi bar du 'gro ba'i don byed pa
T06D4080:165a-2: po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni
T06D4080:165a-3: bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang skye
T06D4080:165a-4: ba rnams zad pa ni thar pa dang /
T06D4080:165a-8: 'gog pa ni mngon du bya ba'o //
T06D4080:165a-9: de thob par byed pa'i rgyu ni ji ltar gsungs
T06D4080:165a-10: pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mtha' dag
T06D4080:165a-11: bsdus pa'i rang bzhin ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum
T06D4080:165a-12: gyi bdag nyid cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du
T06D4080:165a-13: ting nge 'dzin rtogs pa rnam par rtog pas byas
T06D4080:165a-14: la / dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa'i
T06D4080:165a-15: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bdag nyid kyi lam gyi
T06D4080:165a-16: la / bden pa ste / lam ni bsgom par bya zhes pa'o //
T06D4080:165a-17: ji ltar gsungs pa ma lus pa 'di kun yongs
T06D4080:165a-18: su shes pa'i shes rab gang gis yongs su sbyangs
T06D4080:165a-19: na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
T06D4080:165a-21: da ni mdor bsdus te bye brag tu smra ba
T06D4080:165a-22: la sogs pa'i lta ba la gnas pas sna tshogs
T06D4080:165a-23: dang de kho na nyid rim par smra ba nye
T06D4080:165a-29: rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid kyi 'das pa'i phung po lnga dang /
T06D4080:165a-30: ma 'ongs pa'i phung po lnga dang /
T06D4080:165a-31: da ltar gyi phung po lnga dang /
T06D4080:165a-34: ngo bo lnga'i bdag nyid ni sna tshogs so //
T06D4080:165a-35: phung po rnams ni rtag pa de kho na nyid dang /
T06D4080:165a-36: mya ngan las 'das pa rtag pa ni de kho na nyid dang /
T06D4080:165a-37: gang zag mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa rtag
T06D4080:165a-38: pa yang ma yin pa ni de kho na nyid
T06D4080:165a-39: de / nub phyogs pa'i bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyis rtogs pa'i sna tshogs dang /
T06D4080:165a-41: da ltar gyi phung po lnga dang /
T06D4080:165a-43: so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang /
T06D4080:165a-44: so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa ste /
T06D4080:165a-45: ngo bo nyid bzhi'i bdag nyid ni sna tshogs so //
T06D4080:165a-46: phung po rnams mi rtag pa ni kho na nyid dang /
T06D4080:165a-48: so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang /
T06D4080:165a-49: so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa rnams rtag pa ni de kho na nyid do //
T06D4080:165a-50: kha che bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyis rtogs pa'i sna tshogs dang de kho na nyid do //
T06D4080:165a-51: rnam pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa ni phyi rol
T06D4080:165b-0: gyi @165b yul 'dzin cing da ltar gyi phung po
T06D4080:165b-1: lnga po tsam mo zhes dngos po gcig gi bdag
T06D4080:165b-3: de rang rang gi rgyur byas pa nas bzung ste
T06D4080:165b-4: ji srid rgyun gnas pa de srid du rab tu
T06D4080:165b-5: 'jug pa'i bdag nyid tsam ni skad cig ma nyid
T06D4080:165b-6: dang bdag med pa zhes bya ba ni de kho
T06D4080:165b-7: na nyid de // dmod sde ba'i lta ba la
T06D4080:165b-8: gnas pa rnams kyis rtogs pa'i sna tshogs dang de
T06D4080:165b-10: don dam par ston ka'i nam mkha'i sprin med pa
T06D4080:165b-11: lta bu'i gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyid gcig
T06D4080:165b-12: pu'o // yang ma rig pa'i dbang gis brdzun pa
T06D4080:165b-13: 'di lta bu gzung bar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid kyi
T06D4080:165b-14: sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i 'khor lor gsal
T06D4080:165b-15: ba zhes ba rnal 'byor spyod pa'i gzhung gcig go
T06D4080:165b-16: pu'o // // bde ba chen po rang bzhin gsal ba tsam ni bden pa'o //
T06D4080:165b-17: ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi dbang gis sgyu ma bzhin du brdzun pa'i rnam pa'i 'khor lor /
T06D4080:165b-18: rigs pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa rnams don 'di dag
T06D4080:165b-19: gi khyad par bstan par 'dod pa rnams la ma
T06D4080:165b-20: nyams pa'i spyan gyis tshad mas gzhan dag tu bsgrubs
T06D4080:165b-21: zin to zhes bya ba'i don to //
T06D4080:165b-22: de ltar sna tshogs dang de kho na rnam pa
T06D4080:165b-23: du mar brjod du zin kyang 'gro ba ma lus
T06D4080:165b-25: 'phags pa byams pas gsungs pa'i dbu ma yang dag
T06D4080:165b-26: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgrub pa'i thabs nyid
T06D4080:165b-27: la sems can kun gzhug par bya'o //
T06D4080:165b-28: de la sna tshogs rnams ji srid du so sor
T06D4080:165b-29: snang ba de srid lus dang longs spyod dang gnas
T06D4080:165b-30: la sogs pa'i rnam pa rnams rang rang gi sems
T06D4080:165b-32: sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten gnyis su sgro btags pa ni 'khor ba ste /
T06D4080:165b-33: de zad pa ni thar pa'o //
T06D4080:165b-34: de ltar sna tshogs gnyis su med par gsal ba'i
T06D4080:165b-35: rgyun gyi rgyun gyi bdag nyid kyi chos thams cad
T06D4080:165b-36: brtags pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pas stong pa nyid
T06D4080:165b-37: ni sna tshogs dang de kho na nyid do //
T06D4080:165b-38: de dag kyang shin tu rnam par gyur ba ni /
T06D4080:165b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni chos kyi sku'o //
T06D4080:165b-40: de nyid bems po las log pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mngon sum du mdzad pa ni //
T06D4080:165b-41: 'bras bu'i gnas skabs nyid don dam pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T06D4080:165b-42: de nges pa tsam du byas pa ni /
T06D4080:166a-0: @166a * // rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi bdag nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T06D4080:166a-1: sdug bsngal ba gsum gyi mes rab tu 'bar bar
T06D4080:166a-2: 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la bltas pas snying
T06D4080:166a-4: sems can de rnams kun la mnyam pa'i sems dang /
T06D4080:166a-6: gnod sems med pa'i sems dang /
T06D4080:166a-10: bu dang bu mo'i sems dang /
T06D4080:166a-12: snag gi gnyen mtshams kyi sems su bya ba ste /
T06D4080:166a-13: rang gi srog las kyang lhag pa'i byams pa dang por bya zhing /
T06D4080:166a-14: sems can de rnams kun 'khor ba las bsgral zhing /
T06D4080:166a-15: sangs rgyas nyid la rab tu gzhag par bya ste /
T06D4080:166a-16: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya zhing /
T06D4080:166a-17: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song zhing /
T06D4080:166a-18: mi dge ba bcu la sogs pa'i nyes pas spyod pa mtha' dag las log cing /
T06D4080:166a-19: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la goms par bya zhing /
T06D4080:166a-20: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mtha' dag gi rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin pa /
T06D4080:166a-21: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku
T06D4080:166a-22: gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs par gyur
T06D4080:166a-23: nas / ji srid nam 'khor ba ma stongs kyi
T06D4080:166a-24: bar du 'gro ba rnams sgrol bar byed pa ste
T06D4080:166a-25: nas / / pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa la gnas pa'i rim pa'o /
T06D4080:166a-27: // / bi kra sh'i la'i pandi ta ratna k'i rtis
T06D4080:166a-28: mdzad pa dge ba'i sdong po zhes bya ba rdzogs
T06D4080:166a-31: / pandi ta bidy'a ka ra sing ha dang /
